Key Match Events: The LA Lakers rallied from a 22-point deficit to win 123-116.
Anthony Davis, Rui Hachimura, and Austin Reaves carried the Lakers in the first half before LeBron James joined in.
Kevin Durant, Bradley Beal, and Devin Booker combined for 67 points, 19 assists, and eight rebounds.
LeBron James led the turnaround in the third quarter with 11 points and three assists.
Austin Reaves had seven points, three assists, and several savvy plays in the final frame.
